<a id="VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArray"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArray

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeSample3D](VisualShaderNodeSample3D.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A 2D texture uniform array to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Translated to ``uniform sampler2DArray`` in the shader language.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArray_property_texture_array"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md) **texture_array** [ðŸ”—](#VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArray_property_texture_array)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_array**\ (\ value\: [TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md)\ )
- [TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md) **get_texture_array**\ (\ )

A source texture array. Used if [VisualShaderNodeSample3D.source](VisualShaderNodeSample3D.md#VisualShaderNodeSample3D_property_source) is set to [VisualShaderNodeSample3D.SOURCE_TEXTURE](VisualShaderNodeSample3D.md#VisualShaderNodeSample3D_constant_SOURCE_TEXTURE).
